headline: ChampionX On Track For Acquisition By Schlumberger
summary: ChampionX Corporation sees solid growth in Production Chemical Technologies, backed by strong profitability and a Schlumberger acquisition. Click for my CHX update.

headline: Is Trending Stock Schlumberger Limited (SLB) a Buy Now?

headline: SLB Announces Debt Exchange Offer
summary: NEW YORK, February 27, 2025--Schlumberger Limited ("SLB") (NYSE: SLB) today announced that Schlumberger Holdings Corporation, an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of SLB ("SHC"), has commenced offers to exchange certain series of notes listed below (the "Existing SISA Notes"), issued by Schlumberger Investment S.A.
